headline: AES Tops List of Largest Corporate Energy Providers Globally by BNEF
summary: The AES Corporation (NYSE: AES) has been ranked as the top seller of clean energy to corporations globally in 2024, according to BloombergNEF's (BNEF) Corporate Energy Market Outlook. This marks the third consecutive year AES has been a leader in the rankings, which track the volume of corporate Power Purchase Agreement (PPA) signings.
